alert.note: Alert for Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 26 at 5:29AM EDT until May 26 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 600 AM EDT/500 AM CDT/. * At 529 AM EDT/429 AM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Port St. Joe, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Gulf County, including the following locations... Milltown. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
